comment: This course was a very easy A. There were some awkward speaking assignments where you had to come up with props on your own and roleplay, but she grades them based on mostly effort rather than accuracy, so its really hard to fail them if you just do them. I would recommend this class to anyone who is entering a health care environment.

This was my favorite class this semester I took her at Spelman. Very simple and straight forward assignments posted weekly. Tests all straight to the point, you will have a few video assignments. She is very caring and sweet, Cardona was the best part of my semester! Definitely would recommend, passed with a 96, do your work you will be fine.
She is super sweet and made an early morning class much more tolerable. Important to be in class because her lectures explain concepts much better than the book.

I took/taking her for Fall Semester of 2023 and let me say she is by far a wonderful teacher who cares. Group projects so being present in class is mandatory but shes wonderful and will hold a lot of conversations with you. Just put in the effort and you will pass it is not hard I promise.

I love Cardona. She is very sweet and funny and truly cares about her students and has even adjusted days and times of tests and quizzes for us if we ever raised concern. She does teach mainly in spanish but she will explain in english if you need her too and she doesnt teach brand new material in spanish. Most things are through connect.

This was probably my favorite class. Very simple and straight forward assignments posted weekly. test and quizzes all straight to the point few video assignments and projects but they're super easy and can be done in no time if you need a spanish elective especially if you have a heavy work load def take prof. Cardona, best part of my semester!!!!

An absolute beauty. Best professor I have ever had. She wants you to pass. She will nudge you along and help you. So sweet and cares about her students. Class is not hard in itself and she makes it so much easier. I guarantee you will not regret taking her.

One of my favorites, I had her two semesters and wish I could take her more. She was so nice, I genuinely learned in her class, and the tests we're easy if you put in the effort. The hardest part was the homework from connect (she doesn't control that). She made me feel like I could actually learn Spanish, something I struggled with for all of HS.

Professor Cardona was amazing. This online class follows the textbook given and the homework does come directly from the book. Things are due weekly and it is a lot. But If you care, you'll have no problem completing what you need to. She is big on videos and "real-life" Spanish practice, which is the most helpful way to really learn. She's great!!

Loved her! So nice, caring, and helpful. Her class was never boring. I kind of did not like the groups part of class, but I got used to it. I definitely learned in her class. She is also very understanding.
She is super nice and she is eager to help all her students! She answers emails relatively quick and gives great feedback. She also grades easy. Take her if you want a prof who cares!

Pretty easy class for intro Spanish, the homework is online so it's hard because you might forget to do it but its fine. Group projects are usually oral assignments but you have the option of doing it by yourself. She's super nice and caring, very considerate if you have any kind of emergency. Definitely take her if you can.
THE BEST FOR SPANISH 2 SHE IS SO NICE WITHOUT A MEAN BONE IN HER BODY

Awesome professor! Professor Cardona is really, really kind and funny. She enjoys having fun. I genuinely enjoyed going to the class. I like her so much I registered for Spanish 1002 with her as well.

One of the best professors I have had at Kennesaw. I was worried about going in this class, but she met us at any level we were at and always encouraged us to do our best! If you have the chance, definitely take her class.
THE MOST AMAZING SPANISH PROFESSOR!!! TAKE HER IF YOU CAN. SHES SO PASSIONATE WITH WHAT SHE DOES. She cares about her students. If she knows youre trying, she will give you an A.

PROF CARDONA IS AMAZING!!!!! If you have to take any Spanish class, TAKE HER. She wants all of her students to succeed and if you show you're at least trying, she will give you an A or B. Tests and quizzes are super easy, but make sure you come to class so she knows who you are and that you care. If I could take her for any class at KSU I would.

Pretty good professor. Really cares about her students. She will meet each student where they are at with no judgement. However, she would never post her powerpoints until a day or two before the test which made it difficult to study too much. Take your own notes. Offers extra credit throughout the semester.
Fantastic Professor. Cares a Ton. Wants you to learn. Take her if she's available. Worth your time.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Professor Cardona is the best! She really cares about her students and wants everyone to do well in her class, but you have to put forth effort! I'd definitely take her again.
She is an amazing teacher, and a lenient grader. Makes sure you understand everything and will answer any questions until you get it.
Awesome teacher!! Super nice and an easy grader, but you do need to buy the online connect textbook in order to receive homework grades.

love Professor Cardona she is great and i was getting nervous that spanish might not be for me until i had her. She really wants you to know the material so you are constantly going over it and it is a bonus we only cover 3 tests worth of material so you really take your time and learn alot

Wilma Cardona is such an amazing spanish teacher! Out of my five years taking Snapish classes in high school and college, I would have to say she is my all-time favorite teacher. She is very passionate about spanish and tries to make it as interesting and understanding as possible. She is also a very easy grader and will curve tests when needed.

I have taken Senora Cardona for two semesters and I have to say she is the best teacher on campus for spanish and I am upset she doesn't teach 2000 level. She is fun to talk to and always opens the door for in class activity, it isn't just death by powerpoint. You have Connect for HW and 3 tests as mandated by the uni, but you will be ready!

This teacher cured my depression (no, really). She's very happy and caring and treats her students like family. She gives good feedback. The Spanish Department requires a very heavy load of words you gotta memorize in 6 months, but she does as good a job trying to keep up with that demand as anyone could. Taking her again next semester just for fun

I LOVED this woman. She is so sweet and keeps lecture interactive and informative. You will have to work a little to make the A just because you are learning a new language (if it's your first time). Her expectations are extremely clear. There are a few "presentations", two exams, four quizzes, and a final. She's amazing. Take her.

One of the best professors you could ever get. She really wants her students to learn something so not only is the class extremely interactive, but she meets every student where they are at individually. I would recommend her to anybody! If you show up and ask for help you recieve it!
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Love Professor Cardona! She does her very best to make sure every student does well and gets plenty of practice before quizzes and tests. She's super funny and energetic and makes the class interesting. Theres online practice each week but it's super easy and extremely helpful for practice! Textbook isn't really used but has good test reviews.

Professor Cardona was amazing! She helped me achieve what I thougut was impossible, an A in Spanish! She is willing to help outside of class, wants you to succeed and is one of the best professors I have ever had when it comes to actually teaching material.
This class was amazing. She is very helpful and makes it fun. Her projects were fun as well. Attend class. Take all quizzes and exams. She is great!

Professor Cardona is an absolutely wonderful professor! Very helpful for those struggling with Spanish, very clear lectures, and definitely not a boring professor. I'd give her a higher easiness rating if the Spanish 1002 class created by the department was not so tedious. If you're looking to take Span 1002, take her!
